scripts.build:css: rm spectre.css/dist/spectre.css && rm spectre.css/dist/spectre.min.css && sass spectre.css/src/spectre.scss spectre.css/dist/spectre.css && echo 'Archvio construido' && sass spectre.css/dist/spectre.css spectre.css/dist/spectre.min.css --style=compressed
scripts.build:css:exp: rm spectre.css/dist/spectre-exp.css && rm spectre.css/dist/spectre-exp.min.css && sass spectre.css/src/spectre-exp.scss spectre.css/dist/spectre-exp.css && echo 'Archvio construido' && sass spectre.css/dist/spectre-exp.css spectre.css/dist/spectre-exp.min.css --style=compressed
